Clever Geek Handbook

PHP ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç UTF-8‡•§ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó 1

‡§®‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞, ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ã‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§è‡§ï ‡§â‡§ú‡•ç‡§ú‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§≠‡§µ‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§≤‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§ó‡§æ ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à "‡§ï‡•ã‡§∑‡•á‡§∞" UTF-8 ‡§è‡§®‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á, ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡§ü‡§§‡§Æ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ó‡•Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à - ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∑‡§æ - PHP, ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∂‡•ç‡§∞‡•É‡§Ç‡§ñ‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§µ‡§π‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á‡•§



1. ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ö‡§Ø



‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§† ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§®‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ø‡§•‡§æ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§∞‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ ‡§¨‡§ø‡§ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§á‡§ú‡§º ‡§ë‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ú‡§æ‡§® ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§ø‡§™‡•Ä‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•å‡§ú‡•Ç‡§¶ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ñ‡•Å‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§



‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§º‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó (‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç) ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§á‡§® ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§è‡§®‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§Ø‡•á ‡§ü‡•á‡§¨‡§≤ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§ö ‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•á‡§§ ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§ê‡§§‡§ø‡§π‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á, ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø ASCII ‡§è‡§®‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡•à‡§ü‡§ø‡§® ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§ï‡•Å‡§≤ 128 (127 ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§§‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡•á 7 ‡§¨‡§ø‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à)‡•§



‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ASCII ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§Ç‡§•‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§ï‡§à ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§è‡§®‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è ‡§ó‡§è ‡§•‡•á ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç 8 ‡§µ‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§ø‡§ü ‡§ú‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ ‡§µ‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä 256 ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á 128 ‡§™‡§æ‡§∞‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ASCII ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§•‡•á, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§¨‡§æ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§à ‡§µ‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§µ‡§π ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ‡•§ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ë‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§è‡§®‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á‡§ü ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§Ö‡§™‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§ï‡•É‡§§ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•Ä‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ú‡§ü‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§â‡§®‡•ç‡§π‡•á‡§Ç ‡§è‡§≤‡•ç‡§ó‡•ã‡§∞‡§ø‡§•‡§Æ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§≤‡§ó‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•à (‡§®‡§ø‡§Æ‡•ç‡§® ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï)‡•§



‡§®‡§§‡•Ä‡§ú‡§§‡§®, ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§≠‡•å‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§â‡§ü‡§™‡•Å‡§ü ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§è‡§ï ‡§è‡§®‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à (‡§â‡§¶‡§æ‡§π‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§∂‡§æ)‡•§ ‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§≤ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§è‡§ï ‡§è‡§®‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§ó‡§≠‡§ó ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§£‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§®‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§



‡§µ‡•á‡§¨ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ï‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø ‡§è‡§®‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó UTF-8 ‡§π‡•à, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§à ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç:
  • ASCII ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡§§‡§§‡§æ;
  • ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§è‡§®‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§â‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö ‡§∏‡§ü‡•Ä‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§™‡§π‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à;
  • ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ 1 ‡§∏‡•á 4 ‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§¨‡•ç‡§ú‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à (‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§ì‡§ï‡§ü‡•á‡§ü ‡§ï‡§π‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à; ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§®, ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§á‡§® ‡§∂‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§ï ‡§¶‡•Ç‡§∏‡§∞‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç!) ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§




‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Å ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§§‡§≤‡§¨ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•á‡§ú ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•â‡§∞‡•ç‡§° ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§§‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§¨ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§è‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§∑‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§•‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§π‡§∞‡§æ‡§à ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§â‡§¶‡§æ‡§π‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§§‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡§Ç‡§°‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§∏‡§ø‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ (‡§è‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏ - ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§°‡•á‡§ü‡§æ ‡§¨‡§ø‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏) ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç:

‡§¨‡§ø‡§ü ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§§‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ç‡§Ø 1 ‡§∏‡§™‡•ç‡§§‡§ï 2 ‡§Ö‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ï 3 ‡§ì‡§ï‡§ü‡•á‡§ü 4 ‡§ì‡§ï‡§ü‡•á‡§ü
‡§ë‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§ü ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§§‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ï
7 U + 007F 0xxxxxxx
11 U + 07FF 110xxxxx 10xxxxxx
16 U + FFFF 1110xxxx 10xxxxxx 10xxxxxx
21 U + 10FFFF (‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡§ï ‡§∏‡•á, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç U + 1FFFFF) 11110xxx 10xxxxxx 10xxxxxx 10xxxxxx




‡§Ø‡§π ‡§®‡•ã‡§ü‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§∞‡§Ç‡§≠‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ë‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§ü ‡§ï‡•á ‡§â‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö-‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§ø‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ‡§â‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ó‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à - ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Ö‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§£‡•Ä ‡§á‡§ï‡§æ‡§á‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§ï‡•É‡§™‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç: ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ë‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§ü ‡§π‡•à, ‡§§‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§£‡•Ä ‡§á‡§ï‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ï‡•á‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§á‡§∏‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§‡•Ä ‡§ë‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§ü ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó-‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§π‡•à‡•§



‡§è‡§ï ‡§â‡§¶‡§æ‡§π‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§Ü‡§á‡§è ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á "Hi Hi" UTF-8 ‡§è‡§®‡•ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡•á‡§ó‡§æ‡•§



‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡§æ ‡§ï‡§¶‡§Æ‡•§ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§®‡§ø‡§ß‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡•á‡§Ç (‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§π‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§°‡•á‡§∏‡§ø‡§Æ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§£‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§ó‡§æ) ‡§§‡§æ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§∏‡§æ‡§∞‡•§



‡§π‡§æ‡§Ø ‡§π‡§æ‡§Ø = 0x041F 0x0440 0x0438 0x0432 0x044D 0x0442 0x0020 0x0048 0x0069

‡§Ø‡§π ‡§Æ‡§§ ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ã ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§ï ‡§π‡•à‡•§



‡§ö‡§∞‡§£ ‡§¶‡•ã ‡§π‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ‡§°‡•á‡§∏‡§ø‡§Æ‡§≤ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§®‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§è‡§Å ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§ ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§Ç‡§°‡•ã‡§ú 7 ‡§ï‡•à‡§≤‡§ï‡•Å‡§≤‡•á‡§ü‡§∞ (‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§° ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç) ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§



0x041F = 0000 0100 0001 1111

0x0440 = 0000 0100 0100 0000

0x0438 = 0000 0100 0011 1000

0x0432 = 0000 0100 0011 0010

0x0435 = 0000 0100 0011 0101

0x0442 = 0000 0100 0100 0010

0x0020 = 0010 0000

0x0048 = 0100 1000

0x0069 = 0110 1001

‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§∂‡•Ç‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§â‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§æ‡•§ ‡§ï‡•É‡§™‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç: ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§≤‡§ó ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§¨‡•ç‡§ú‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§



‡§ö‡§∞‡§£ ‡§§‡•Ä‡§® ‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§ü‡•Ä‡§è‡§´ -8 ‡§ë‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§ü ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§µ‡•á‡§¶‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§



0x041F = 100 0001 1111 = 110 xxxxx 10xxxxxx = 110 10000 10 011111

0x0440 = 100 0100 0000 = 110 xxxxx 10xxxxxx = 110 10001 10 000 000

0x0438 = 100 0011 1000 = 110 xxxxx 10xxxxxx = 110 10000 10 111000

0x0432 = 100 0011 0010 = 110 xxxxx 10xxxxxx = 110 10000 10 110010

0x0435 = 100 0011 0101 = 110 xxxxx 10xxxxxx = 110 10000 10 110 101

0x0442 = 100 0100 0010 = 110 xxxxx 10xxxxxx = 110 10001 10 000010

0x0020 = 010 0000 = 0 xxxxxx = 0 0100000

0x0048 = 100 1000 = 0 xxxxxx = 0 1001000

0x0069 = 110 1001 = 0 xxxxxx = 0 1101001

‡§ï‡§æ‡§â‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡•ç‡§° ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ ‡§ï‡•É‡§™‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç: 0x0080 ‡§§‡§ï ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∏‡§π‡•á‡§ú‡•á ‡§ó‡§è ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç, ‡§Ø‡§π ASCII ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡§§‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§ü‡•Ä‡§è‡§´ -8 ‡§µ‡§ø‡§Ç‡§°‡•ã‡§ú‡§º -1251 ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§®‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∏‡•Ä-‡§≠‡§æ‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§† ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è 2 ‡§ó‡•Å‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® (2 ‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏) ‡§≤‡•á‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡•á‡§µ‡§≤ 1 ‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§



‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç (‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§∂‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Ç): "11010000 10011111 11010001 10000000 11010000 10111000 11010000 10110010 11010000 1010101 11010001 10000010010000 01001000 01101001"‡•§



‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç:

$ tmp = '' ;

foreach ( ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§´‡•ã‡§ü) ( '' , '11010000 10011111 11010001 10000000 11010000 10111000 11010000 10110010 11010000 10110101 11010001 10000010 00100000 01001000 01101001 ) $ ‡§ì‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§ü ) {

$ tmp = chr ( bindec ( $ octet ) ) ;

}

‡§ó‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§ú $ tmp ;




‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§ë‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à (‡§∏‡§∞‡§≤‡•Ä‡§ï‡•É‡§§):
  1. 1 ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ö‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ï ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§π‡•á‡§ú‡•á‡§Ç;
  2. ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ì‡§ï‡§ü‡•á‡§ü ‡§ï‡§æ‡§â‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§õ‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç, ‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§ö‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç;
  3. ‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø 1 ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ë‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§ü ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ë‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§® 2 ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§∂‡•á‡§∑ ‡§ï‡•ã 6 ‡§¨‡§ø‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§à‡§Ç ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§∂‡§ø‡§´‡•ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ë‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§ü ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§ö‡§≤‡•á 6 ‡§¨‡§ø‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡•á‡§Ç;
  4. 1 ‡§¨‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Å ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§§‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§§‡§ï ‡§¶‡•ã‡§π‡§∞‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç :)‡•§




‡§ë‡§™‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ú‡•ç‡§° PHP ‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§®‡§ø‡§ß‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§≤‡§ü‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ö‡§æ‡§≤‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§Æ‡§§‡§ø ‡§¶‡•á‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à (‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ö‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∂‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§ó‡§æ):

Copy Source | Copy HTML class String_Multibyte { /** <br/> * UTF-8 , $index $char. <br/> * , , BOM 0x10FFFE-0x10FFFF FALSE. <br/> * <br/> * [...] , . <br/> * <br/> * @author Andrew Dryga <anddriga at gmail>, {@link http://andryx.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $char (). <br/> * @param int &$index , . , . <br/> * @return int|false FALSE , . <br/> */ public function getCodePoint( $char , & $index = 0 ) { // $octet1 = ord( $char [ $index ]); // ASCII ( 0bbb bbbb), . if ( $octet1 >> 7 == 0x00 ) { return $octet1 ; } elseif ( $octet1 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { // if (! isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } // $octet2 = ord( $char [ $index ]); // ( 10bb bbbb) if ( $octet2 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } // 6 $octet2 &= 0x3F ; // , if ( $octet1 >> 5 == 0x06 ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x1F ) << 6 | $octet2 ; // if ( 0x80 < $result ) { return $result ; } } else { if (! isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet3 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet3 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet3 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 4 == 0x0E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x0F ) << 12 | $octet2 << 6 | $octet3 ; // ; , BOM if ( 0x800 < $result && !( 0xD7FF < $result && $result < 0xF900 ) && $result != 0xFEFF ) { return $result ; } } else { if (! isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }



  1. Copy Source | Copy HTML class String_Multibyte { /** <br/> * UTF-8 , $index $char. <br/> * , , BOM 0x10FFFE-0x10FFFF FALSE. <br/> * <br/> * [...] , . <br/> * <br/> * @author Andrew Dryga <anddriga at gmail>, {@link http://andryx.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $char (). <br/> * @param int &$index , . , . <br/> * @return int|false FALSE , . <br/> */ public function getCodePoint( $char , & $index = 0 ) { // $octet1 = ord( $char [ $index ]); // ASCII ( 0bbb bbbb), . if ( $octet1 >> 7 == 0x00 ) { return $octet1 ; } elseif ( $octet1 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { // if (! isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } // $octet2 = ord( $char [ $index ]); // ( 10bb bbbb) if ( $octet2 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } // 6 $octet2 &= 0x3F ; // , if ( $octet1 >> 5 == 0x06 ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x1F ) << 6 | $octet2 ; // if ( 0x80 < $result ) { return $result ; } } else { if (! isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet3 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet3 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet3 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 4 == 0x0E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x0F ) << 12 | $octet2 << 6 | $octet3 ; // ; , BOM if ( 0x800 < $result && !( 0xD7FF < $result && $result < 0xF900 ) && $result != 0xFEFF ) { return $result ; } } else { if (! isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }



  2. Copy Source | Copy HTML class String_Multibyte { /** <br/> * UTF-8 , $index $char. <br/> * , , BOM 0x10FFFE-0x10FFFF FALSE. <br/> * <br/> * [...] , . <br/> * <br/> * @author Andrew Dryga <anddriga at gmail>, {@link http://andryx.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $char (). <br/> * @param int &$index , . , . <br/> * @return int|false FALSE , . <br/> */ public function getCodePoint( $char , & $index = 0 ) { // $octet1 = ord( $char [ $index ]); // ASCII ( 0bbb bbbb), . if ( $octet1 >> 7 == 0x00 ) { return $octet1 ; } elseif ( $octet1 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { // if (! isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } // $octet2 = ord( $char [ $index ]); // ( 10bb bbbb) if ( $octet2 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } // 6 $octet2 &= 0x3F ; // , if ( $octet1 >> 5 == 0x06 ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x1F ) << 6 | $octet2 ; // if ( 0x80 < $result ) { return $result ; } } else { if (! isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet3 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet3 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet3 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 4 == 0x0E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x0F ) << 12 | $octet2 << 6 | $octet3 ; // ; , BOM if ( 0x800 < $result && !( 0xD7FF < $result && $result < 0xF900 ) && $result != 0xFEFF ) { return $result ; } } else { if (! isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }

isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }

isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }

isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }

isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }

isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }

isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }

isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }

isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }

isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }

isset ( $char [++ $index ])) { return false ; } $octet4 = ord( $char [ $index ]); if ( $octet4 >> 6 != 0x02 ) { -- $index ; return false ; } $octet4 &= 0x3F ; if ( $octet1 >> 3 == 0x1E ) { $result = ( $octet1 & 0x07 ) << 18 | $octet2 << 12 | $octet3 << 6 | $octet4 ; // ; ; // , Unicode 10FFFF if ( 0x10000 < $result && $result < 0xF0000 ) { return $result ; } } } } return false ; } } /** <br/> * UTF-8 . <br/> * [...] <br/> * @author ur001 <ur001ur001@gmail.com>, {@link http://ur001.habrahabr.ru}. <br/> * @param string $codePoint Unicode character ordinal. <br/> * @return string|FALSE UTF-8 FALSE . <br/> */ public function getChar( $codePoint ) { if ( $codePoint < 0x80 ) { return chr( $codePoint ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x800 ) { return chr( 0xC0 | $codePoint >> 6 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x10000 ) { return chr( 0xE0 | $codePoint >> 12 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } elseif ( $codePoint < 0x110000 ) { return chr( 0xF0 | $codePoint >> 18 ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 12 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint >> 6 & 0x3F ) . chr( 0x80 | $codePoint & 0x3F ); } else { return false ; } } }

GetChar () ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§ø Jevix ‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡•Ä ‡§ó‡§à ‡§•‡•Ä, ‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§π‡§≤‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§µ‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§•‡§æ, ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•Ä ‡§§‡§∞‡§π ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Ç ‡§§‡§ï ‚Äã‚Äã‡§ï‡§ø ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§Æ‡•É‡§§‡§ø ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ó‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ó‡§Ø‡§æ, ‡§§‡•ã ‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ‡§ï ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§ñ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§¨‡•á‡§à‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä‡•§



‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§™‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç:

  1. // ‡§µ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§â‡§¶‡§æ‡§π‡§∞‡§£ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Å
  2. $ obj = new String_Multibyte ();
  3. // ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•Å‡§µ‡§ø‡§ß‡§æ‡§ú‡§®‡§ï ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç
  4. $ tmp = '' ;
  5. foreach (‡§µ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§´‡•ã‡§ü) ( '' , '11010000 10011111 11010001 10000000 11010000 10111000 11010000 10110010 11010000 10110101 11010001 10000010 00100000 01001000 01101001 ) $ ‡§ì‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§ü ) {
  6. $ tmp = chr (bindec ( $ octet ));
  7. }
  8. // ‡§ö‡§∞‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∂‡§æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Å
  9. $ ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∂‡§æ = ‡§∏‡§∞‡§£‡•Ä ();
  10. $ ‡§≤‡•á‡§® = ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡§≤‡•á‡§® ( $ tmp );
  11. ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ( $ i = 0 ; $ i < $ l ; $ i ++) {
  12. ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§∞ ( ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä == ( $ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ = $ obj -> getCodePoint ( $ tmp , $ i ))) {
  13. $ ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∂‡§æ [] = $ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ ;
  14. }
  15. }
  16. // ‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§æ‡§´‡§º ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡•à‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∞‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ã‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç
  17. $ tmp = '' ;
  18. $ ‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§‡•Ä = ‡§ó‡§ø‡§®‡§§‡•Ä ( $ ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∂‡§æ );
  19. ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ( $ i = 0 ; $ i < $ count ; $ i ++) {
  20. $ tmp ‡•§ = $ obj -> getChar ( $ ‡§®‡§ï‡•ç‡§∂‡§æ [ $ i ]);
  21. }
  22. // ‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç
  23. ‡§á‡§ï‡•ã $ tmp , '<br />' .EOL;
  24. // ‡§á‡§∏‡•á ‡§µ‡•à‡§ß‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö‡•á‡§Ç (‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ ‡§π‡•à)
  25. ‡§ó‡•Ç‡§Ç‡§ú preg_match ( '#‡•§ {1} #u' , $ tmp )? '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§®‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§°' : '‡§Ö‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§§' , '<br />' .EOL;
‡§Æ‡•à‡§Ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•Å‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞ ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã‡§∂‡§ø‡§∂ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§á‡§∏‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Ç‡§≤‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§•‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§§‡•Å‡§∞‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§£‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ ‡§∏‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§®‡§¶‡•á‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§Ü‡§â‡§ü‡§™‡•Å‡§ü ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§π‡§Æ‡•á‡§∂‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à, ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§Ü‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§¨‡§π‡•Å‡§§ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§π‡•à‡•§



‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§™‡§æ‡§† ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§§‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à, ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§á‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡§æ‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï (‡§Ö‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§Ø, ‡§ó‡•à‡§∞-‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§ï‡§®, ‡§Ö‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§, ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ã‡§ó‡•á‡§ü ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§ø) ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§π‡§ü‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§Ö‡§ó‡§≤‡•á ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡•§



‡§™‡•Å‡§®‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö:
‡§Ü‡§ó‡•á ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£, ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ, ‡§ï‡•ã‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•á ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§î‡§∞ PHP ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç UTF-8 ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§ó‡§æ‡•§



‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§≠:
  • unicode.org ;
  • ‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§ü‡•Ä‡§è‡§´ -8 ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞
